attributes.additional_details: Ebay are being allowed to print their own money due to very unfair fee's they charge, Insertion fee 35p final value fee 10%  postage fee 10% plus "THEIR"  Paypal fee's, the most unfair  charge is postage which I do think is the backdoor payment ebay is using and it is the public that are targeted the most, Ebay should scrap the insertion fee scrap the 10% postal charge and half their final value fee and put an end to  withholding payments for days on end once a dispute is settled,
